title: Dyson tackles pet hair - Official Dyson Video
description: Dyson Ball Multifloor captures hair and ground-in dirt.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
Dyson Ball Multifloor captures hair and ground-in dirt. 

http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson

transcripts: We have two small dogs and they shed hair everywhere. Tumbleweeds of fur. In order for a vacuum to work in our house before to get a ball of my dog's hair we would have to sweep it first, we would dust, and then we would have to vacuum. Our Dyson vacuum is amazing, it sucks up all the dirt, all the dog hair, whatever it is that the dog brings inside. I was walking around the house and I'm like Rico look at how much we got just from our bedroom where the dogs are. The Dyson vacuum picks up all of the dog hair and all of the crumbs that my other vacuums never were able to touch. I'm now kind of campaigning for a fourth or fifth dog.
